roleset.name: To grow bony tissue resulting in closing space between bony structures

example.name: Arg0
example.text: How do you treat stenosing synovitis of the thumb?

roleset.note: Based on data in medical QA corpus; adjectival 'stenotic' found in medi-seedcorpus. (Framed by Anwen 07/20/10)

example.name: adjectival rel: stenotic
example.text: Distal SFA / proximal popliteal artery is extremely calcified and severely stenotic at a level 13 mm superior to the knee .
example.arg: at a level 13 mm superior to the knee
